Author: jl777c#5810
Content: Likely someone that wants to fork KMD ecosystem will not find it easy to just build a new release as there are literally dozens of different components. Certainly a clone will have some value, usually 1% or so of the original. People value the team that creates the softare, not so much the ones that just make a copy

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: The main issue is which version (original or clone) will be the one to make the next improved version first?
